attributes.action: ensure that the Post Office at Godfrey Street, Heanor, Derbyshire is not considered for closure in the upcoming or any future rounds of post office closures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heanor Post Office provides an essential service for local people in our small market town. We have already lost many nearby sub-post offices and our sorting office and it is essential for the future well-being of our community that this divestment is halted now.
